episodes.title: Reset (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: Shania and Nick break back into the junkyard to find what's really going inside now.
episodes.longDescription: Shania thinks everything is the worst right now. Nick is not allowed back in the junkyard as per his Mom's new rules, Anne's not answering her walky-talky, and the junkyard has newly upgraded security. Nick thinks Anne doesn't want them to come in while Shania thinks the junkyard has been taken over by an evil genius. In order to find what's really going on behind the now even higher junkyard fence, Shania and Nick break back into the junkyard.

episodes.title: The Mother of Invention - Part 1 (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: Anne and Nick are finally building Anne's Mom's designs.
episodes.longDescription: In the first part of our series finale, Anne and Nick are finally building Anne's Mom's designs -it's a giant hologram machine complete with lasers! Shania lets everyone know that there's a school dance that night and they scored Anne and Pal tickets. Anne agrees to go after they finish her Mom's machine. While they're putting the finishing touches on it, the machine starts to play a message from Anne's Mom but it malfunctions just before Anne can see it. Anne works feverishly to fix it - seeing her mother is more important than a school dance. Meanwhile, when Magnus 23's upload into Ada's android body fails, Ada sends her army of Pal 2.0s to the junkyard to steal Pal once and for all.

episodes.title: The Mother Of Invention Part 2
episodes.shortDescription: Anne, Nick, Shania and all the androids successfully defend themselves against Ada.
episodes.longDescription: In the second part of our series finale, Anne, Nick, Shania and all the androids successfully defend themselves against Ada and the Pal 2.0s. While they're celebrating, Anne's Mom's hologram machine starts to work and plays the message for Anne from her mother. It's an emotional moment as Anne sees her mother for the first time. However, yet again, before the message can play out in full, the machine malfunctions again. This time, before Anne can fix it, Ada reveals that they haven't won quite yet - she's taken Nick's Mom hostage and demands a trade: Mom for Pal. Anne sacrifices her Mom's machine to create a Pal hologram and fools Ada into destroying her Pal 2.0s. Ada is finally beaten. After that, Anne decides to the androids out and into the world as her Mom's message inspired her to share her gifts with everyone. She realizes the world deserves to know about the androids and the androids deserve to know about the world.

episodes.title: Android's Best Friend (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: The androids find a cat in the junkyard and try to take care of it.
episodes.longDescription: When the androids find a cat in the junkyard, they fall in love with it and try to take care of it. Meanwhile, Anne is doing an experiment on plants and how to make them grow.  Unfortunately, her plants are eaten by her robo-mouse but, fortunately, the androids have a feline solution to her mouse problem.

episodes.title: Message in a Rocket
episodes.shortDescription: Anne, Nick and Shania are doing test runs of a rocket messenger system.
episodes.longDescription: School starts tomorrow and Anne, Nick and Shania are doing test runs of a rocket messenger system so that they can stay in touch during the school day. Unfortunately, one of their rocket attempts accidentally collides with a pigeon. As Shania and her Grandma nurse the pigeon, Anne and Nick realize that they need something smarter and more adaptable than a rocket to be able to carry messages. That's when an ordinary pigeon becomes Harrier Pigeon.

episodes.title: Family Matter
episodes.shortDescription: Nick's Mom gets curious about what's going on in the junkyard when she finds a USB in Nick's room.
episodes.longDescription: Nick's Dad has to cancel on a weekend tobogganing trip because he has to work. Nick is upset both because his Dad bailed and because there's no snow in his new town yet. Anne and Shania decide to make snow for Nick so he can still go tobogganing even if he can't do it with his Dad. Meanwhile, Nick's Mom gets curious about what's going on in the junkyard when she finds an old USB lying around in Nick's room.

episodes.title: Enemy Lines
episodes.shortDescription: Bonnie and Darren, two neighbourhood bullies, bully Garth and takes his favourite toy, his Turbo-kid, Anne tries to step in but isn't very helpful.
episodes.longDescription: When Bonnie and Darren, two neighbourhood bullies, bully Garth and takes his favourite toy, his Turbo-kid, Anne tries to step in. She's no match for two bullies and they end up taking her digital lab notebook as well. Anne, Nick and Shania have no choice but to break in to Bonnie and Darren's highly secure, tree fort and steal it back. Meanwhile, Garth sees Pal over the fence of the junkyard and thinks Pal is his favourite superhero, Turbo-kid.

episodes.title: Palception
episodes.shortDescription: Anne realizes that Pal's not having nightmares, Pal's receiving messages from Magnus 22!
episodes.longDescription: Pal is having nightmares about Magnus 22 and a faceless robot. Pal's nightmares are so bad that they cause Pal to sleepwalk out of Pal's sleep bay, over to Shania's backyard and into the middle of the street. Things go from bad to worse when Anne realizes that Pal's not having nightmares, Pal's receiving messages from Magnus 22 and their making it so that Pal can't recharge. Anne and her friends have to sever the connection between Pal and Magnus 22 or they may lose Pal forever. By bringing Hand into the message to fight off Magnus 22, Anne finds a way to sever the connection. But when Pal wakes up, Pal is worried about Magnus 22 and wants to be its friend.

episodes.title: Power of Love (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: Anne tries different ways to generate electricity for her project and Hand develops a crush on the truck.
episodes.longDescription: Anne tried an experiment with power but the electricity keeps going out. While an electric company truck comes to fix it, Anne tries different ways to generate electricity and Hand develops a crush on the truck.

episodes.title: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup Formers
episodes.shortDescription: It's a hot day and the pups head for the water park. / The Paw Patrol do a circus performance for Adventure Bay!
episodes.longDescription: The clues: A knitted sock with the word Torvik inside, a small rock, a wooden dragonhead The file label: "It Was Them" The investigation: The sock clue leads Kyla to a group of re-enactors called Torvik. After learning some basic sword fighting moves, she discovers that the sock was made using a knitting technique called nalbinding, which is how Vikings made socks and mittens. The kids wonder if this mystery might be about Vikings. E.B. heads to a Viking archeology lab to investigate the rock. Turns out It's a piece of slag iron, which is what was left over after the Vikings made iron. He helps forge a rivet just like the Vikings did for their awesome ships! Kyla discovers there's a Viking ship at sea right now. It's the biggest modern day Viking ship ever built. She video chats with a crewmember aboard the ship and finds out that the dragonhead clue from the mystery file is almost exactly like the dragon figurehead on this ship. Vikings used to put dragon figureheads on their shi

episodes.title: ULTIMATE RESCUE: Pups Save the Movie Monster
episodes.shortDescription: Envious Humdinger tries to draw the Adventure Bay Monster Movie production to Foggy Bottom.
episodes.longDescription: The clues: A knitted sock with the word Torvik inside, a small rock, a wooden dragonhead The file label: "It Was Them" The investigation: The sock clue leads Kyla to a group of re-enactors called Torvik. Kyla discovers there's a Viking ship at sea right now. It's the biggest modern day Viking ship ever built. She video chats with a crewmember aboard the ship and finds out that the dragonhead clue from the mystery file is almost exactly like the dragon figurehead on this ship. episodes.title: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Baby Octopus
episodes.shortDescription: During the big luau, the Paw Patrol is on hand as lifeguards to make sure everyone stays safe.
episodes.longDescription: Everyone is celebrating the opening of Adventure Beach with a big luau. The Paw Patrol is on hand as lifeguards to make sure everyone stays safe.  But when Cap'n Turbot's boat is attacked by a multi-tentacled creature it's time to bring out the Paw Patrol's newest vehicle the Sea Patroller!  Ryder and the pups take the big boat out to rescue Cap'n Turbot and the Flounder, but no sooner is that done when tentacles are causing big trouble at the beach!  As the pups rescue the beachgoers, we see that a baby octopus is on the loose and its near-sighted momma is simply trying to rescue it.  Clever Ryder and the pups reunite the family and even help the mom see better!

episodes.title: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! / Its Chase's birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party.

episodes.title: SEA PATROL: Pups Save their Pirated Sea Patroller (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: The Ferris wheel has been stolen and sunk by Sid the Pirate and Arrby.
episodes.longDescription: The Ferris wheel has been stolen and sunk by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to find it and bring it back to adventure bay! However Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

episodes.title: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Baby Octopus (Described Video)
episodes.shortDescription: During the big luau, the Paw Patrol is on hand as lifeguards to make sure everyone stays safe.
episodes.longDescription: Everyone is celebrating the opening of Adventure Beach with a big luau. The Paw Patrol is on hand as lifeguards to make sure everyone stays safe.  But when Cap'n Turbot's boat is attacked by a multi-tentacled creature it's time to bring out the Paw Patrol's newest vehicle the Sea Patroller!  Ryder and the pups take the big boat out to rescue Cap'n Turbot and the Flounder, but no sooner is that done when tentacles are causing big trouble at the beach!  As the pups rescue the beachgoers, we see that a baby octopus is on the loose and its near-sighted momma is simply trying to rescue it.  Clever Ryder and the pups reunite the family and even help the mom see better!

episodes.title: Komodo Dragon
episodes.shortDescription: Gourmand is heading to the island of Komodo.
episodes.longDescription: While Koki is monitoring her daily "villain watch", she discovers that Gourmand is heading to the island of Komodo.  The name sounds familiar, but she can't recall why, so she goes and asks the Kratt Brothers who do a double take.  The island only has the world's largest lizard - the Komodo dragon!   They decide they better go and see what Gourmand is up to on the island of these amazing creatures.

episodes.title: The Cobra King
episodes.shortDescription: The Kratts bros learn about the dual creature powers of the cobras - venom and a hooded defense.
episodes.longDescription:
While searching for Martin's lost Creaturepod, the Kratt brothers encounter a Spectacled cobra.  In a wild adventure to recover their prized gadget, the bros learn about the dual creature powers of the cobras - venom and a hooded defense.  But when they encounter a King cobra, their newfound cobra powers are put to the ultimate test.
    
   Science Concept:  Venom in nature.  How it works and why animals have it.

episodes.title: Hercules the Giant Beetle
episodes.shortDescription: A Hercules beetle accidentally gets enlarged.
episodes.longDescription: Androids joins the adventures of animated Chris and Martin and their Wild Kratts team, as they encounter incredible animals. Combining science education with fun and adventure, the Kratt Bros and their crew travel to animal habitats around the globe. Each adventure explores an age-appropriate science concept central to an animal's life and showcases a wildlife moment, all wrapped up in engaging stories of adventure, mystery, rescue and the Kratt Brothers brand of laugh-out-loud-comedy that kids love. The educational goal is to teach 4 - 8 year old viewers natural history and age-appropriate science by building on their natural interest in animals. Also to develop and strengthen basic skills of observation and investigation that children will use increasingly as they continue their study of science.

episodes.title: Wild Ponies
episodes.shortDescription: It's up to Martin and Chris to rescue a foal and reunite him with his mother.
episodes.longDescription: While creature adventuring on the sand dunes, Martin and Chris discover a band of Wild Ponies.   An excited Aviva and Koki rush over to meet their ,favorite creature,, but before they can get acquainted, a rogue wave hits the shore, separating a young foal from his mother.  It's up to Martin and Chris to rescue the foal and reunite him with his mother.

episodes.title: Temple of Tigers
episodes.shortDescription: The Kratt Brothers worry that they've somehow lost their signature 'creature sense'.
episodes.longDescription: After Aviva successfully sneaks up on and surprises the creature adventuring Kratt Brothers, they worry that they've somehow lost their signature 'creature sense'.  Chris and Martin go off in search of the stealthiest, most powerful wildcat in the world - the tiger - on a quest to prove to themselves that they're still in tune with the creature world.

episodes.title: Elephant Brains
episodes.shortDescription: The Wild Kratts try to figure out the differences between African and Asian elephants.
episodes.longDescription: The Wild Kratts are on a mission to figure out the differences between African and Asian elephants.  They soon discover that despite their differences, all elephants have lots in common. Like feelings, emotions and real intelligence.

episodes.title: Sloth Bear Suction
episodes.shortDescription: The Wild Kratts try to figure out if a Sloth bear is a bear or a sloth?
episodes.longDescription: While in India, the Wild Kratts try to figure out if a Sloth bear is a bear or a sloth?  They soon discover some unique creature powers of this animal,  including special features that enable it to harness the power of suction to acquire food.

episodes.title: Creepy Creatures! -Part 2
episodes.shortDescription: The Kratt bros decide to discover some new "creepy cool" creatures for Halloween.
episodes.longDescription:
The Wild Kratts aren't too sure what to do for Halloween. Should they go trick or treating or just have a Halloween Party? The Kratt bros decide that the best thing to do is to discover some new "creepy cool" creatures. Heading off to find these new animals friends, Martin and Chris don't realize that Zach and the other villains
 have come up with a plan to ruin Halloween. Can the Wild Kratts defeat the villains and still get to celebrate Halloween?
